name: The Kungfu Scrolls
description:
In the game, you can play 8 unique heroes, encounter different monsters, experience impressive adventure in an extraordinary fantasy world. There are also massive kinds of martial arts and methods waiting for your exploration.

The gameplay is mainly based on deck construction. During a game, players need to carefully build his deck from scratch, make choices about all facets of the adventure, and form the hero which best fit the unpredictable challenges.

The game has exquisite Chinese ink-and-wash style creatures and background, which w ill definitely gives you an immersive game experience. No time to wait, come and be THE hero the Kungfu Scrolls are always waiting for !
